actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to protect elected judges against discrimination based on age.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to declare that persons elected or appointed to judicial office are not excluded from the definition of "employee" for purposes of the Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to protect elected judges against discrimination based on age.
